What follows are the 10 indisputably funniest moments of The Simpsons seasons 1-10:#1: Radioactive Man: "My Eyes! The goggles do nothing!"

#2: Lyle Lanely: "You know, a town with money is a little like a mule with a spinning wheel. No one knows how he got it and danged if he knows how to use it."
[crowd laughs]
Homer: "He heh... mule."

#3: Bart: "This play has everything!"
Homer: "Oh, I love legitimate theater."

#4: Wiggum: "(Gasp) It's a ghost car! There are ghost cars all over these highways you know"
Homer: "Hold me!"
Wiggum: "Only if you hold me!"

#5: Krusty: OK, we'll start off with the baggy -- wha? [sees Homer] Those are supposed to be baggy pants! Baggy!"
Homer: "Ooh. I've never had a pair of pants fit this well in my life."

#6: Milhouse: "So this is what it feels like ... when doves cry!"

#7: Ralph Wiggum: "Me fail English? That's unpossible!"
#7b: Ralph Wiggum: "What's a battle?"

#8: Bart stealing Homer's change, Indiana Jones-style

#9: George Harrison: "Hello Homer. I'm George Harrison."
Homer: Oh, my god. OH, MY GOD! Where did you get that brownie?"

#10: Milhouse: Wow! Joseph of Arimathea! 26 conversions in A.D. 46"
